summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of the Unified Landing Page feature. All 7 features tested and passed. The landing page successfully merges EMR and Pharmacy entry points into a single page at root URL (/).

test_credentials.note: No credentials required - landing page is public

context_for_next_testing_agent: Unified landing page at root URL (/) is fully functional. Both portal cards (Yacco EMR and Yacco Pharm) navigate correctly. Mobile menu toggle works. All 16 Ghana regions displayed. Platform Admin link in help section works.

unified_landing_page_at_root.details: Landing page displays at root URL (/) with data-testid='unified-landing-page'

emr_portal_card_visible.details: Yacco EMR portal card visible with green theme, heart icon, and 4 features (Secure & Compliant, Multi-Facility, Role-Based Access, Clinical Tools)

pharm_portal_card_visible.details: Yacco Pharm portal card visible with blue theme, pill icon, and 4 features (e-Prescription, NHIS Claims, Inventory, Nationwide)

emr_navigation.details: Clicking EMR portal card or 'Hospital Staff Login' button navigates to /login

pharm_navigation.details: Clicking Pharm portal card or 'Pharmacy Portal' button navigates to /pharmacy

mobile_menu_toggle.details: Mobile menu toggle (hamburger icon) visible on mobile viewport, opens/closes navigation menu with Portals, Regions, Help links

platform_admin_link.details: Platform Admin Access link exists in help section and navigates to /po-login

ghana_regions_display.details: All 16 Ghana administrative regions displayed with capitals: Greater Accra, Ashanti, Central, Eastern, Western, Western North, Volta, Oti, Northern, Savannah, North East, Upper East, Upper West, Bono, Bono East, Ahafo

portal_features_display.details: EMR features (4) and Pharmacy features (4) displayed correctly in respective portal cards

ui_design_review.color_contrast: PASS - Good contrast throughout. Green theme for EMR, Blue theme for Pharmacy
ui_design_review.spacing_padding: PASS - Consistent spacing and padding across all sections
ui_design_review.responsive_design: PASS - Mobile viewport displays correctly with stacked cards and hamburger menu
ui_design_review.footer: PASS - Footer includes copyright, Ghana Health Service Certified badge, portal links, and Coming Soon iOS/Android badges

notes: The unified landing page successfully merges the EMR and Pharmacy entry points. Users can now access both portals from a single page at the root URL. The page is well-designed with clear visual distinction between the two portals (green for EMR, blue for Pharmacy).
